extendedInfo.description: Introducing To-Fu 2, the sequel to the blockbuster hit, To-Fu: The Trials of Chi. Reunite with To-Fu and harness the power of Chi! Get ready to smash through objects with the all-new Super Ping move and be prepared for many new obstacles and challenges. Ping around corners with 45 degree blocks & ricochet off rebound blocks across 115 all-new, brain-bending levels. The newly added Time Trial mode tasks you with collecting as much Chi as you can within the time limit. To-Fu 2 also features a brand new store than enables you to purchase extravagant costumes for your favorite soy hero and many other helpful goodies. To-Fu's back, and he's stretchier than ever!â¢ Unique Stretch Control: Stretch and ping To-Fu using nothing but your finger! Master the all new 45 degree corners and whip around each trial at amazing speed!â¢ Brain-Bending Challenges: 115 all-new trials for To-Fu to master and perfect. Hours of gameplay and replay value for gamers of all levels!â¢ Time Trial Mode: Help To-Fu collect as much Chi as possible in a set amount of time!â¢ To-Fu Store: Customize your To-Fu with fun accessories, costumes and other goodies!Purchasing any in-game item removes all advertisements.

reviews.title: Fun game that looks great..
reviews.comment: Really nice graphics, fun and interesting play elements. Get\'s harder as you go along, but worth the download, no issues found on GS3!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cant even play
reviews.comment: When I open the game all that pops up is a gray screen and a red bar that appears and disappears. Please fix and I will reinstall
reviews.author: Natalie Sims

reviews.title: No video
reviews.comment: All I get from this game along with the first is a broken grey screen even though the audio works just fine. Please do something about this.
reviews.author: Ivan Campbell

reviews.comment: Great gameplay, graphics issues and randomly closes when proceeding to next level\tGreat gameplay however after certain levels the game just closes (it\'s not a force close however), at least the game progress saves, so when re-opening I\'m always on the next level. On the Asus Transformer Infinity TF700T 32GB model which I have, there are some minor in-game graphical glitches and in the menus, however this does not affect gameplay.

reviews.comment: Awesome plain simple fun

reviews.title: Looks great, but..
reviews.comment: Green teleports don\'t work if you hit them dead on. They only work if you hit them at an angle. Wont let me pass level 66.
